CustomField.formula: IF( /*配車完了と配車完了以降の状態：falseを返す*/ OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "DispatchCompleted"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "DeliveryCompleted"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancel"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "InvoiceConfirmed") ), false, AND( NOT( ISBLANK(ExpectedDeliveryDate__c) || ISBLANK(DispatchDetail_Cnt__c) ), OR( Account__r.AccountCode__c = $CustomMetadata.MFJSetting__mdt.CreateShippingSalesReportParameter.Value4__c, Account__r.Parent.AccountCode__c = $CustomMetadata.MFJSetting__mdt.CreateShippingSalesReportParameter.Value4__c ), IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingCompany__c)), ISPICKVAL(ShippingCompany__r.Type, "Subcontractor") ), TRUE, OR( ISBLANK(DriverMaster__c), ISBLANK(VehicleNumber__c) ) ), NOW() > /* 納品日の前日 */ DATETIMEVALUE( (ExpectedDeliveryDate__c - 1) + 5/24 ), DispatchDetail_Cnt__c > 0 ) )
CustomField.label: 富士エコーの配車組み確定遅延フラグ
